definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: This method can also be used for paraboloid and hyperboloid.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法也适用于抛物面和双曲面。

sentences.english: Mechanism of the lapping influence on the dynamic behavior of hypoid gears is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了研齿对准双曲面齿轮副动态性能的影响机理。

sentences.english: The basic principle for the geometrical design of hypoid gears is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了准双曲面齿轮几何设计的基本原理。

sentences.english: An optimum design method of hypoid gear is proposed;
sentences.chinese: 提出准双曲面齿轮的优化设计方法。

sentences.english: The principles of optical imaging are illustrated by a hyperbolic mirror.
sentences.chinese: 采用双曲面镜，演示其光学成像原理。

sentences.english: The three independent time differences generate three different rotational hyperboloids. Rotational hyperboloids are curved surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 三个独立的时间差得到三个旋转双曲面。

definition: body of a vehicle or machine/fuselage of a plane
inch (unit of length equal to 2.54 cm.)
